version_description:
Fixed game not running properly on iPhone 6 Plus.

Also check out our new arcade game Ball King!
www.facebook.com/ballkinggame

Fixed game not running properly on iPhone 6 Plus.

Also check out our new arcade game Ball King!
www.facebook.com/ballkinggame

This update is bringing you 4 NEW LEVELS!

Other changes:
- Game over screen now shows difference from best time
- Medium level #13 Death Hills replaced with much shorter version
- Fixed bug where ice was not breaking
- Fixed game crashing on startup for some players
